Home 























 




Illustrated leaf (ca. 1335) from The Burke Collection of Early Italian Miniatures 







 






        Search      

 Search form

Search 


 







Catalog  |  Articles+
Find books, media, journals, and more in Catalog; journal articles in Articles+.


Databases  |  eJournals
Select a database for in-depth research; or find a specific citation or journal.


EarthWorks
Discover geospatial data collections owned by Stanford Libraries and other institutions.


Online exhibits
Explore notable digital collections showcased by our librarians and curators.


Specialists
Get advanced research assistance in dozens of subject areas.


Digital repository
Deposit data, papers, and other resources for long-term access.


Data services
Get help managing, sharing, and preserving your data.


Support the Libraries
Enrich our collections and services with donations and gifts.

 








        Features      



  












Stanford Libraries launches Taube Archive of the International Military Tribunal at Nuremberg, 1945-46




















East Asia Library hosts exhibition of student posters on "Religion in Manga and Anime"




















Sound pioneer Ray Dolby’s personal papers are donated to Stanford Libraries’ Silicon Valley Archives
